Post.title: git
Post._content:
## arch LinuxGit
Debianarch LinuxGitGitwiki
1. 
``` bash
vim ~/bashrc
#
[ -f /usr/share/git/completion/git-completion.bash ] && source /usr/share/git/completion/git-completion.bash
#
source ~/bashrc
```
2. bash-completlon
```bash
yaourt -S bash-completion
```
[archlinux wiki](https://wiki.archlinux.org/index.php/git)

git
1. --system /etc/gitconfig
2. --global ~/.gitconfig~/.config/git/config
3. --local  .git/config (git config)

:-->-->

## Git
```bash
#
git config  --global user.name wind
git config  --global user.email @gmail.com
#--global
git config user.name

#
git config  --global core.editor=vim
git config  --global merge.tool=vimdiff
```
## Gitgithub
GitHTTPSSSH

#### https

```bash
git config --global credential.helper cache #cache(15)store()
```
#### SSH
1. ssh
```bash
ssh-keygen -t rsa -b 4096 -c @gmail.com
```
id_rsa()id_rsa.pub()
2. 
github Settings-->SSH and GPG keys-->New SSH Key

![](https://ws1.sinaimg.cn/large/006VAXiDgy1fiuoz5sl3oj30wx0j4dhv.jpg)

3. PC
```bash
ssh-add id_rsa
```
4. 
```bash
ssh -T git@github.com
#
#Hi leolee! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub does not provide shell access.
```
:
    [Git](http://debugtalk.com/post/head-first-git-authority-verification/)
    [git hook](http://www.jianshu.com/p/9fcd5522e86b)

Post.title: 3arch Linux arm
Post._content:
# arch Linux 
IP ssh
sshalarm
sshalarm
rootroot
## 0. 

```bash
nano /etc/pacman.d/mirrorlist
Server = http://mirrors.ustc.edu.cn/archlinuxarm/$arch/$repo
```

## 1. 
```bash
pacman -Syu
```
## 2. rootsudo
```bash
su #root
pacman -S sudo
nano /etc/sudoers
```

```bash
%wheel ALL=(ALL) ALL

%wheel ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL
```

## 3. root
```bash
sudo passwd alarm
sudo passwd root
```
## 4. 
```bash
sudo useradd -d /home/mofeng -m mofeng
sudo passwd mofeng
```
## 5. sshroot
```bash
nano /etc/ssh/sshd_config
PermitRootLogin yes
```
## 6. 
```bash
nano /etc/hostname
```
## 7. 

wget git curl vim 
```bash
pacman -S wget git curl vim
```
## 8. aruyaourt

yaourt 
```bash
pacman -S base-devel
```
yaourt[](http://doku.ben00it.fr/dokuwiki/doku.php?id=linux:raspberry:yaourt)

```bash
pacman -S gcc cmake fakeroot pkg-config
```
yajl

```bash
cd /tmp/
mkdir yajl
cd yajl
vim PKGBUILD
makepkg -Acs
sudo pacman -U yajl-2.1.0-1-armv7h.pkg.tar.xz
```
PKGBUILD
```
# Maintainer: Dave Reisner <d@falconindy.com>
# Contributor: Daniel J Griffiths <ghost1227@archlinux.us>
# Contributor: Thomas Dziedzic < gostrc at gmail >
# Contributor: Andrej Gelenberg <andrej.gelenberg@udo.edu>

pkgname=yajl
pkgver=2.1.0
pkgrel=1
pkgdesc='Yet Another JSON Library'
arch=('i686' 'x86_64' 'armv7' 'armv7h' 'armv7l')
url='http://lloyd.github.com/yajl/'
license=('ISC')
makedepends=('gcc' 'make' 'cmake')
source=("$pkgname-$pkgver.tar.gz::https://github.com/lloyd/$pkgname/archive/$pkgver.tar.gz")
md5sums=('6887e0ed7479d2549761a4d284d3ecb0')
build() {
  cd "$pkgname-$pkgver"
  cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/usr .
  make
}
package() {
  cd "$pkgname-$pkgver"
  make DESTDIR="$pkgdir" install
  install -Dm644 COPYING "$pkgdir/usr/share/licenses/${pkgname}/LICENSE"
}
```
package-query

```bash
cd /tmp
git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/package-query-git.git
cd package-query-git
makepkg -Acs
pacman -U package-query-*.xz
```
yaourt 
```bash
cd /tmp/
git clone https://aur.archlinux.org/yaourt.git
makepkg -Acs
sudo pacman -U yaourt*.tar.xz
```
## 9. 

ifconfig,routenet-toolsnslookup,digdnsutilsftp,telnetinetutils,ipiproute2

```bash
pacman -S net-tools dnsutils inetutils iproute2
```



## 10. /boot/config.txt

#### 10.1 

```bash
pacman -S alsa-utils

# 
dtparam=audio=on
hdmi_drive=2 #HDMI
audio_pwm_mode=2 #3.5mm
```

#### 10.2 GPIO
yaourtaur
```bash
yaourt -S python-raspberry-gpio
```

#### 10.3 I2C

i2c-toolslm_sensors

```bash
yaourt -S i2c-tools lm_sensors
```
/boot/config.txti2c

```
dtparam=i2c_arm=on
```

[](https://rocka.me/archive/my-first-archlinux-rpi3)
[](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/25988799)
[archrc.locl](https://www.yumao.name/read/archlinux-systemd-rc-local/)

Post.title: qemuarmraspberrypi
Post._content:
> B
> qemu
> qemu

# Arch Linux Install QEMU
QEMU
```
yaourt -S qemu
#armqemu-arch-extra 
yaourt -S qemu-arch-extra 
```
# 
#### 1. raspbian 
[](https://www.raspberrypi.org/downloads/)
[](https://downloads.raspberrypi.org/)
[2017-08-16-raspbian-stretch-lite.zip](https://downloads.raspberrypi.org/raspbian_lite/images/raspbian_lite-2017-08-17/2017-08-16-raspbian-stretch-lite.zip)
#### 2. 
###### 2.1. (QEMU)
>os rasbian uanem -r
:
1. [raspberrypi linux](https://github.com/raspberrypi/linux)(git cloen https://github.com/raspberrypi/linux.git)
2. [linux-kernel ](https://www.kernel.org/)
3. [Linux-kernel-4.4.84](https://cdn.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/v4.x/linux-4.4.84.tar.xz)

###### 2.1.1 
>SDOSraspberrypi
```
#4.12.9
wget https://cdn.kernel.org/pub/linux/kernel/v4.x/linux-4.4.84.tar.xz
xz -d linux-4.4.84.tar.xz && tar -xvf linux-4.4.84.tar
rm linux-4.4.84.tar
cd linux-4.4.84/
#raspberrypi
git cloen https://github.com/raspberrypi/linux.git)
cd linux
```

###### 2.1.2 arm
>
```
#
export ARCH=arm
export CROSS_COMPILE=arm-linux-gnueabihf-
####arm-linux-gnueabi-gcc
yaourt -S arm-linux-gnueabihf-gcc
####
git clone https://github.com/raspberrypi/tools.git
export PATH=$PATH:(glone)arm-bcm2708/gcc-linaro-arm-linux-gnueabihf-raspbian/bin
###64
export PATH=/home/mofeng/work/linux-kernel/raspberrypi-tools/arm-bcm2708/gcc-linaro-arm-linux-gnueabihf-raspbian-x64/bin
### 
arm-linux-gnueabihf-gcc -v
###
make -j4  defconfig
###
make -j4 menuconfig
##
make -j4  #PCCPU4-j4
##
cp arch/arm/boot/Image ../kernel-rpi.img
```

###### 2.2 qemu-kernel
[github](https://github.com/dhruvvyas90/qemu-rpi-kernel)
```
git clone https://github.com/dhruvvyas90/qemu-rpi-kernel.git
cd qemu-rpi-kernel
```
kernel-qemu-4.4.34-jessietool./build-kernel-qemu

4.4.34

```
qemu-system-arm -kernel kernel-qemu-4.4.34-jessie -cpu arm1176 -m 256 -M versatilepb -no-reboot -serial stdio -append "root=/dev/sda2 panic=1 rootfstype=ext4 rw" -redir tcp:5022::22 -hda /dev/sdb
```
> 
> -kernel 
> -cpu armcpuqemu-arm -cpu help
> -m 
> -M qemu-system-arm -M help [wiki](https://wiki.qemu.org/index.php/Documentation/Platforms/ARM)
> -append 
> -hda img

4.4.34

```

```
> 
> -kernel 
> -cpu armcpuqemu-arm -cpu help
> -m 
> -M qemu-system-arm -M help [wiki](https://wiki.qemu.org/index.php/Documentation/Platforms/ARM)
> -append 
> -hda img

Post.title: 3Ghost
Post._content:
Ghost1.0Ghost-cli1.5.2
## 1. 
### 1.1 
GhostUbuntu 16 RaspbianUbutun
Ubutun[](https://ubuntu-mate.org/raspberry-pi/)
### 1.3 
~~~ bash
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade -y
sudo apt-get install nginx
sudo apt-get install mariadb-server
sudo ufw allow 'Nginx Full'
~~~
mariadb mysqlmysqlmariadbmysqlmysqloraclemysql
mariadbroot
ufw allow 'Nginx Full' HTTPHTTPS

### 1.4 Node.js
NodejsNodejs(v6.11.1)
~~~
curl -sL https://deb.nodesource.com/setup_6.x | sudo -E bash
sudo apt-get install -y nodejs
~~~
### 1.5 Ghost-Cli
Ghost
~~~
sudo npm i -g ghost-cli
~~~

### 1.6 
#### 
~~~
adduser <username>
usermod -aG sudo <username>
su - <username>
~~~
username 

#### 
~~~
sudo mkdir -p /var/www/ghost
sudo chown [user]:[user] /var/www/ghost
cd /var/www/ghost
~~~
## 2. Ghost
~~~
ghost install
~~~

Ghost1.5.2
1. 
2. MySQLroot
3. MySQLMySQL
4. Ghostghost_production
5. ghost
6. Nginx
7. SSL
8. Ghost
9. Ghost
![](https://ws1.sinaimg.cn/large/006VAXiDgy1filybxi2sgj30n90dbdpj.jpg)
